attributes.action: ...abandon the translation of all official documents into minority languages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national language of the United Kingdom is English. Its citizens should be proficient in English. The translation of official documents into Urdu, Welsh, Gaelic, Polish, Mandarin and dozens of other minority tongues not only gives new arrivals an excuse not to assimilate, it costs the country ridiculous sums of money. The public budget should not be wasted on such politically correct window-dressing. Drop any and all multiple-language translation at once.
